MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL20 postcode area of LLangollen, affecting properties in Pentredwr and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10 AM due to repairs to a faulty transformer and broken equipment on our overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9: 14AM on  18th October 2020.
